meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Barbara Gooby Andrew Knudsen Evelyn Rubin Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7830.

td.p: Barbara Gooby, an executive assistant from Savannah, Georgia
Andrew Knudsen, an environmental lawyer from Washington, D.C.
Evelyn Rubin, a family physician from Toronto, Ontario, Canada (whose 2-day cash winnings total $52,402)

tr.td: 20th CENTURY DECADES
TV CRIMESOLVERS
PARTS OF THE WHOLE
PUB GRUB
3 CONSONANTS, NO VOWELS

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Jimmy of the Clue Crew presents.) What looks like smoke emanating from Falcon 9 before launch is super-chilled LOx, this liquid gas used as propellant; it\'s vented as pressure builds, & it\'s so cold that it actually condenses the atmosphere around the rocket')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Jimmy of the Clue Crew presents.) What looks like smoke emanating from Falcon 9 before launch is super-chilled LOx, this liquid gas used as propellant; it's vented as pressure builds, & it's so cold that it actually condenses the atmosphere around the rocket

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
